Reviews.Content: Large spacious lounge Hotel rooms were small and they were not full at all, but we were given a room far away at the back. Breatfast was E 15 each day - very expensive and food was not covered and small flies were hovering all over: when this was pointed out, restaurant manager just covered it instead of removing it all together. We found the service terrible: the hotel staff did not have any information about tours or tour times: we were told no tours were available on holidays and we found out that was not true. Staff also told us to use the outside path to get to our rooms with our bags on a cold and rainy day: there was an indoor path which they did not mention at all!! Staff was couteous but just had no clue about their own services and did not seem to notice or care what guests needed.House keeping was also not very good at cleaning our rooms: garbage bins were not cleared and our beds were not made most mornings. This was an old abbatoir (slaughter house) and frankly, we found the atmosphere very strange - rooms and main building are separated and spread out: very inconvenient for the elderly. We booked this hotel through United Airlines.
Reviews.Author: LanThwar

Reviews.Content: Friendly hotel for tired tourists, loved the service. The first night in a foreign country for an inexperienced traveller is just plain scary. Took us quite a while to figure out where to pick up our baggage at Frankfurt Airport after a 12 hour daytime flight from Cape Town. Adventurous we had to be, so the inviting taxi was ignored and we took the famous German trains. All the ticketing officers where courteous, spoke English and we were soon on our way.Reception was gracious and we were soon settled in a large room with space for all the baggage and plenty to spare. They even kept the restaurant open for us and we experience our first proper German meal, with beer for only 鈧?9. A wonderfull experience as we were the only people in the restaurant and never felt hurried.The next morning, checkout only at 12, which allows you some time to sleep of the adrenaline of the flight, we checked our baggage into storage for free and spend the day exploring Offenbach and stocking up on supply's for our Motorhome.I can honestly reccommend this hotel for all RV renters in Frankfurt, Good food, reasonably priced, friendly staff, able to converse fluently in English and an imaginative setting
Reviews.Author: Erich7

Reviews.Content: Excellent Business Class Hotel, 20 mins outside city centre though. Stayed here for 3 nights, including New Years Eve in Frankfurt. Hotel is very good standard, very suited to business travellers but it is roughly 20 mins drive from the centre of Frankfurt. We did not realise this when booking! There were 5 of us staying at this hotel so a taxi into the city centre worked out roughly 拢3 each so not too bad.Hotel is very nice looking, it may have possibly been a train terminal or something as it has interesting architecture. Rooms spacoius modern furnishings. A double room was 2 beds pushed together and we each had a duvet-i didnt mind this at all!!Hotel has a sauna, beware naked people!! Us brits went in with swim suits on, the gremans in true style did not. We each laughed at each other for very different reasons!We did not have breakfast here as it was roughly 拢12 and we choe to go into the city center where there are fantastic restaurants coffee shops and bars. Vapiano restaurant and Pizza Factory highly recommended! The hotel also has a bar/restaurant next door which was very busy on a saturday night and did brilliant cocktails.We went to Frankfurt to see a friend and a change of scene to celebrate New Year. All we did for 4 days was eat drink walk around and laugh a lot!
Reviews.Author: shangri-lada

Reviews.Content: Good hotel near the airport I stayed in ACHAT plaza hotel with a friend in august. It's a very good hotel, large room, comfortable and large bathroom (the bath is exellent!). The reception is very good, they welcome us warmly ! The hotel is near a farm, so if it's warm and you open the windows, you'll here chicken... but there's a very good sound proofing, so if you close your windows, there's no problem ! To conclude, I would recommend this hotel to business men or to people who wants to take their plane the next day .. !
Reviews.Author: derek13

Reviews.Content: Fabulous modern hotel with impeccable service I stayed in this hotel as part of a European tour in March 2005; it was definitely my favorite hotel during our entire tour (we got to stay in about 8 hotels all throughout Europe). I loved how modern the hotel is; the bathroom was definitely the most high-tech one I've ever seen. The room was spacious and very clean, as well as soundproof. The look of the room is very appealing too, as clean lines run throughout and sleekness is everywhere you look. The staff, too, was very helpful with information about how to get around to Frankfurt and were always pleasant. As part of the tour, I was able to eat breakfast and dinner at the hotel - and both meals were delicious. The only problem I had with the hotel was how far it was from the city - however, with the help of a cab ride, it is very manageable (it takes around 20-30 minutes to walk to the city centre). I would, without a doubt, stay in this hotel again.
Reviews.Author: USCgirlie

Reviews.Content: Fantastic Hotel (and Ultra Modern !!!!) What a Cool Place !!! So ultra modern..... rooms are VERY confortable and super clean. Loved the decor and bathrooms. This was a great little find. Staff very friendly and helpful. I would for sure stay here again. It is quiet .... just make sure the windows are closed. (It is next to a farm but you hear nothing if the windows are closed. (No Airplanes noise either).Great sound proofing. My brother wants to design his house like the rooms. The bathroom is 5 stars for sure. (Great area too).The building is superb and I will for sure be back. It is worth the 20 min stroll from the station .... or cab ....(I also took a cab which was 5 Euros). It is worth staying a little further out .... prices are alot cheaper and all you need to do it take a cab for 5 Euros (or walk 20 mins). You get way better value. Everyone was so friendly.For sure one of the best hotels I have ever stayed in.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Great Hotel Very large clean hotel. The rooms are large, clean and well maintained. The staff was outstanding. We had a problem in our booking through hotels.com but the staff did not hesitate to get it fixed. They were very helpful on several other matters in which we needed help. The person that was the most cordial and helpful was Ms. Otto.The included breakfast was also very good.I would use this hotel again and would highly recommend it.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Excellent, unique hotel The hotel has a great location. Very convenient to reach the airport and Frankfurt fairgroud. A very unique hotel, at is was build within a historical building. Got a great deal on their homepage: ---------------
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Do you like to listen to rooster's crowing? Lovely hotel, very helpful staff, but....- no A/C in rooms. The reception has A/C, so they advertise as air conditioned- located next to a large and noisy chicken farm. When your windows are wide open due to no A/C, and it's dawn in Deutschland, be prepared to wake up.
Reviews.Author: gfranz

Reviews.Content: Quite Location Hotel has large, clean rooms with a good sized, modern bathroom. Situated on flight path for Frankfurt Airport but very good sound proofing allmost completely eliminates any sound from outside. The reception staff are very pleasant and the reception lounge has a television set tuned to CNN for guests seated in the lounge area. Overall definately recommended.
Reviews.Author: Kiwijohnboy

Reviews.Content: Not an ideal hotel for the Frankfurt Messe The hotel is rather far from the Offenbach Hauptbahnhof (which is a 30 minute ride from Frankfurt Main Hauptbahnhof), so each taxi ride was about 5-6 Euro to the hotel. Otherwise, the hotel itself was decent, we received great customer service from Adri, the duty manager. Breakfast was very nice.
Reviews.Author: lass=

Reviews.Content: Park Plaza Offenbach: Fantastic Find A perfect place to spend the night before your departure from Frankfurt. The hotel does not offer a shuttle to the airport, however, if you have a car you can be to the airport in about 15-20 minutes. We were able to get a phenomenal price on their website for a Sunday night stay. The hotel is large, modern and offers comfortable, well furnished rooms and bathrooms even if they are starting to show a bit of wear. There were lots of people at the hotel when we checked in, so I suspect it sees a lot of travelers. The breakfast buffet in the morning offered hot eggs and meats as well as a full spread of cheeses, meats, rolls, fresh fruits and yogurts. A fantastic find near the airport for a great price. We will be back.
Reviews.Author: zeebdee

Reviews.Content: 脺berbucht + Service keine 4 Sterne wert- Das f眉r rund 120鈧?im DZ   showReview(22410519, 'full');
Reviews.Author: LoraTadin

Reviews.Content: Sehr zu empfehlen immer wieder gerne   showReview(16603302, 'full');

Reviews.Content: Service schlecht - Hotel in Ordnung   showReview(13193159, 'full');
Reviews.Author: lass=

Reviews.Content: Trotz schlechter Lage sehr komfortabel!   showReview(11380360, 'full');
